overview: Get ready to put the pedal to the metal with this interactive 90-minute workout filmed in 4k ultra HD along the breathtaking Crater Road as it winds up the summit of the epic Haleakala volcano on the Hawaiian Island of Maui. This exhilarating DVD will power your workout while you take in the incredible views. Give your bicycle workout that extra motivation to help you burn calories even faster.
title: Virtual Cycling: Hawaii
